description: The Crimson Dynamo (Russian: Багровый Динамо, Bagrovyj Dinamo; also Красный Динамо (Krasný Dinamo) ) is the name of several fictional characters in the Marvel Comics Universe, most of whom have been supervillains. The character's original incarnation first appeared in Tales of Suspense #46 (Oct. 1963). The various Crimson Dynamos have been powered armor–wearing Russian or Soviet agents who have clashed with the superhero Iron Man over the course of his heroic career.
name: Crimson Dynamo
powers: but usually includes: resistance to damage
flight. The 8th version could also be piloted by remote control using only its helmet
